Voltorb (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0099: Kingler
Pokémon
#0101: Electrode →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Voltorb (TCG Pocket).

Voltorb has been featured on 36 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Voltorb cards are normally Lightning-type or Grass-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Voltorb

Voltorb
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
